Parent Portal has been used by ACA for some time to provide parent access to attendance and grade information for your students. The company that provided this access has been acquired by Ascender and a new Parent Portal will be rolled out in the coming weeks. This was scheduled prior to the time of COVID and since attendance and grade data will not be entered at this time, we will move forward with the transition. Please know that Parent Portal may not be available during this transition period. If you are able to log into Parent Portal, it will likely look quite different. Once our transition is finalized and we are prepared to upload new information on attendance or grades, we will send guidance on how to navigate the new interface. As a parent myself, my child's school went through this transition without any parent communication and we were able to navigate the new system fairly easily. Still, we want to keep you informed.

We are thankful for the partnership we have with our parents!

Meet Arlington Classics Academy's newest board member, Tania Cotter.

Tania has been a resident of Arlington/Grand Prairie for over 2 decades. She and her husband Jason have 2 daughters. One in 5th grade at ACA, now her 6th year with the school, and big sister Kailey is in her final year at UTA. And of course Butterscotch is the 3 year old Standard Poodle that runs the house. Tania has spent 4 years serving on ACA PTO as President/Treasurer and loves giving back to the school, faculty, students, and families. Tania attended high school and college in Oklahoma, with a degree in Marketing/Management from the University of Oklahoma. She has spent the last 16 years working at AMN Healthcare, assisting healthcare organizations across the country in finding the right staffing solutions and qualified clinicians to meet their patient care goals. Dedicated and committed, Tania loves ACA and appreciates the opportunity to contribute to the culture, experience, and future of our wonderful school.
